name: CVE-2019-19926
description: multiSelect in select.c in SQLite 3.30.1 mishandles certain errors during parsing, as demonstrated by errors from sqlite3WindowRewrite() calls. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-19880.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sqlite:sqlite:3.30.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_workbench:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:enterprise_linux_desktop:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:enterprise_linux_server:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:enterprise_linux_workstation:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:opensuse:backports_sle:15.0:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:suse:package_hub:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:suse:linux_enterprise:12.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_backup:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
